Comment: *어제 컴퓨터가 고장이 나서 교재 메시지 전달이 늦어졌습니다. 죄송합니다.* 오늘은, 최첨단 주방에서의 IOT(Internet Of Things)의 활약을 볼 수 있습니다.
EnglishComment: Today, you'll see Internet Of Things (IOT) in a state-of-the-art kitchen.

Themes.Theme: National Pearl Harbor Remembrance Day -- CNN 10 recalls the attack that led to the U.S. entry into World War II.
A kitchen where everything is connected, will the food actually be as good?
